issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Pass python version as setuptools pretend version in the macOS wheel builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Forgot to define SETUPTOOLS_SCM_PRETEND_VERSION in order to have the right version numbers in the wheels.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12172?focusedCommentId=17315425) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9872
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9872>
